data.title: Kevin and Perry Go Large at Morecambe Bay
data.meta_description: IT May not be Ibiza, but Morecambe is a close second.
data.text:
Comedy duo Kevin and Perry (played by Dean Taylor and Lea) will be DJing at Buzz Bingo in Morecambe, on Marine Road.

They will be playing Ibiza classics, and the host will be a comedian on number-calling duties.

Along with the Ibiza classics, DJ Jim Slipp will be playing hits from the 80s, 90s and today.

Tickets are currently on General Release, which is £11.25. The final Release will be £15.65.

The original Kevin and Perry Go Large starred Harry Enfield and Kathy Burke, with references to Ibiza's rave culture. It developed the character of Kevin, who originally starred as a truculent teenager in the TV show Harry Enfield and Chums.

The film has since received a cult following due to its soundtrack, which managed to appeal across the generations. The film featured music from artists such as Fatboy Slim, Underworld, Ayla, and Groove Armada.
